CaseRelatedIssue.name: CaseRelatedIssue
CaseRelatedIssue.description: This object acts as a junction between a customer issue (Case) and the Incident or Problem that represents an associated service failure.

CaseId.description: A relationship field that represents the case you're linking a Problem or Incident to.

Name.description: A brief description of the related case.

RelatedEntityType.description: Shows what type of object the related entity is.

RelatedIssueId.description: A polymorphic relationship field that represents a related Problem or Incident.

RelationshipType.description: Shows how two records relate to each other.

UniqueKeyIndex.description: This field is unique within your organization.
